Name: showAdminPanel
Description: Allows users to edit settings in the advanced settings panel

Name: showEditorContent
Description: Allows users to edit the messages of Editor users

Name: allowSupport
Description: Allows a user to lofin as a support user, a user that can login for every user using (username)>>

Name: allowTouch
Description: Allows users to use the Touch functionality

Name: allowMusic
Description: Allows users to edit the Music streams panel

Name: showAdminCategories
Description: Allows users to edit the categories made by a Admin user

Name: allowMessageTag
Description: Aloows users to open the advanced PlayerTag selection popup for Messages

Name: allowMobile
Description: Allow user to assign messages to mobiles
